entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Paulatuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Paulatuk Airport 02:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -28.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -32.1°C
Wind: S 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:36 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blizzard developing in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:36 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind south 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:36 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
